entries.name: Archmage Aethas Sunreaver

traits.name: Sunreaver Portalwork
traits.effect: Establishes arcane links for rapid redeployments.

traits.name: Council Leverage
traits.effect: Sways neutral factions with political pressure.

entries.description: Figurehead of the Sunreavers and a canny political actor. Equally at home in a war council or a mage conclave.

entries.name: Archmage Khadgar

traits.name: Gateway Conjuration
traits.effect: Opens tactical portals for rapid redeployments or retreats.

traits.name: Sage of Three Eras
traits.effect: Once per scene, convert a failed check into a narrow success via hard-earned insight.

entries.description: A steady hand of the Kirin Tor—mediator, problem-solver, and veteran of world-shaping crises.

entries.name: Banshee Queen Sylvanas Windrunner

traits.name: Black Arrow
traits.effect: Arrows tainted with dark magic that linger, draining the target's health.

traits.name: Banshee Form
traits.effect: Transforms into an ethereal banshee, capable of flight and possessing others.

entries.description: Legendary ranger-general of Quel'Thalas who was slain defending Silvermoon against the Scourge. Raised into undeath by Prince Arthas, she has been tormented by her curse ever since.

entries.name: Blood Knight Talthis

traits.name: Shield of the Court
traits.effect: Projects a brief barrier for nearby allies in formation.

traits.name: Drillmaster’s Bark
traits.effect: Squads under Talthis snap to orders; gain poise after rally.

entries.description: A hard-edged trainer and field captain whose standards are as uncompromising as his guard.

entries.name: Captain Auric Sunchaser

traits.name: Diplomatic Shield
traits.effect: Reduces fallout from faction incidents in cities.

traits.name: Silver Ensign
traits.effect: Nearby Quel’dorei rally against overwhelming odds.

entries.description: High elven captain and visible standard-bearer for the Silver Covenant’s honor.

entries.name: Dark Ranger Velonara

traits.name: Veilshot Step
traits.effect: Blink between shadowed cover; gains advantage on the next shot.

traits.name: Silencing Arrow
traits.effect: Briefly disrupts spellcasting and calls for aid.

entries.description: A pragmatic dark ranger accustomed to hard choices; her aid comes with sharp conditions.

entries.name: Examiner Tae'shara Bloodwatcher

traits.name: Site Safety Protocols
traits.effect: Mitigates hazards from traps and unstable relics during digs.

traits.name: Relic Catalog
traits.effect: Quickly classifies finds; allies gain targeted advantages vs. artifact effects.

entries.description: A meticulous field examiner of the Reliquary with a talent for turning rubble into revelation.

entries.name: First Arcanist Thalyssra

traits.name: Leyline Attunement
traits.effect: Allied casters near ley nodes act with added clarity and speed.

traits.name: Arcanist’s Focus
traits.effect: Sustains complex spells; reduces disruption from counter-magic.

entries.description: Leader of the Nightborne of Suramar—formal, decisive, and newly allied with Silvermoon’s interests.

entries.name: Grand Magister Belo'vir Salonar

traits.name: Arcane Aegis
traits.effect: Wards dampen magical assaults for a short time.

traits.name: Glyph Scribe
traits.effect: Imprints temporary wards that stabilize nearby spellwork.

entries.description: Deceased former grand magister of Quel'Thalas. Stationed at Isle of Quel'Danas.

entries.name: Grand Magister Rommath

traits.name: Arcane Aegis
traits.effect: Wards dampen magical assaults for a short time.

traits.name: Interdict
traits.effect: Interrupts teleportation and planar travel in a radius.

entries.description: Architect of Silvermoon’s modern arcane doctrine. Stern, pragmatic, and brutally effective against enemy casters.

entries.name: High Examiner Tae'thelan Bloodwatcher

traits.name: Artifact Appraisal
traits.effect: Identifies relic properties; reduces risk from cursed finds.

traits.name: Field Cartography
traits.effect: Generates maps that grant movement advantage.

entries.description: Frontier scholar of the Reliquary. Turns dusty ruins into living leads with a quill and a pry bar.

entries.name: Locus-Walker

traits.name: Veil Step
traits.effect: Passes through the Veil to evade danger.

traits.name: Teach the Void
traits.effect: Allows allies to channel controlled shadow safely once.

entries.description: Now a magister of Silvermoon, Zaedana was dispatched to the ruins of Theramore during the Fourth War where she battled Alliance forces, but has since returned to Quel'Thalas to continue her work for the Magistry. Most recently, she's taken it upon herself to initiate an investigation of a suspected traitor within the ranks of the Magistry.

entries.name: Matriarch Lady Liadrin

traits.name: Light’s Vindication
traits.effect: Holy strikes burn through corruption.

traits.name: Sanctified Aegis
traits.effect: Projects a brief ward that shelters nearby allies.

entries.description: Leader of the Blood Knights, tempered by hard truths and renewed purpose. A rallying presence on any battlefield.

entries.name: Mehlar Dawnblade

traits.name: Zeal Tempered
traits.effect: Pushes through fear and hesitation; steadies nearby squires.

traits.name: Grave Duty
traits.effect: Against undead foes, gains brief resolve after each exchange.

entries.description: A driven Blood Knight whose past trials in the Ghostlands shaped an unflinching sense of duty.

entries.name: Ranger-Captain Alleria Windrunner

traits.name: Void Trueshot
traits.effect: Arrows tear through veils and illusions.

traits.name: Rift Step
traits.effect: Short blink through the Veil to reposition.

entries.description: Legendary ranger, tempered by the Void but unbroken by it. A bridge between high elven traditions and new shadowed arts.

entries.name: Ranger-Captain Venn'ren

traits.name: Falcon Watch Garrison
traits.effect: Enlists local aid; reduces travel time in the region.

traits.name: Ashen Stamina
traits.effect: Less affected by environmental hazards in wastelands.

entries.description: Pragmatic Farstrider captain who keeps outposts alive with grit and triage.

entries.name: Ranger-General Halduron Brightwing

traits.name: Volley Command
traits.effect: Coordinated volleys stagger enemy lines.

traits.name: Ghostlands Pathfinder
traits.effect: Ignores terrain penalties in woodland and ruin.

entries.description: Commander of the Farstriders. Keeps the borders secure with crisp orders and sharper arrows.

entries.name: Ranger-General Vereesa Windrunner

traits.name: Silver Covenant Rally
traits.effect: Quel’dorei allies gain morale and precision.

traits.name: Spellbane Arrow
traits.effect: Shots disrupt enemy spellcasting briefly.

entries.description: Leader of the Silver Covenant. Defends high elven dignity with a commander’s clarity and a mother’s ferocity.

entries.name: Regent Lord Lor'themar Theron

traits.name: Thalassian Command
traits.effect: Nearby Farstriders and magisters act with greater discipline.

traits.name: Farstrider’s Poise
traits.effect: Calm precision; resists forced movement and distractions.

entries.description: Regent Lord of Quel'Thalas. A measured statesman and veteran ranger, balancing Silvermoon's politics with the realm’s defense.

entries.name: Tharessa Sunstrand

traits.name: Glyph Scribe
traits.effect: Imprints temporary wards that stabilize nearby spellwork.

traits.name: Diplomatic Prowess
traits.effect: Reduces backlash from volatile negotiations and court intrigue.

entries.description: A polished magistrix who moves easily between courtly halls and field camps as Silvermoon’s envoy.

entries.name: Valeera Sanguinar

traits.name: Blade Flurry
traits.effect: Rapid strikes overwhelm a single target’s guard.

traits.name: Court Connections
traits.effect: Opens doors in human and elven courts alike.

entries.description: A deft blade and deft diplomat, moving between worlds as easily as between shadows.

entries.name: Voren'thal the Seer

traits.name: Prophetic Insight
traits.effect: Once per scene, forewarns allies of a threat.

traits.name: Arcane Defection
traits.effect: Turns enemy caster wards against their owners.

entries.description: Vision-touched leader whose defection reshaped allegiances. Values redemption and hard choices.
